div.p: CASIO Privacy Policy for South African teachers based on the current policy, accessible here & here.

The official website for the Casiocalculators-MEA.com is committed to protecting the rights of all visitors and members to the site, meaning, we are dedicated to preserving the confidentiality of personal and sensitive information. This privacy policy is created as a declaration for the disclosure of our approach in the collection and dissemination of information on this website.
The Privacy Policy and terms described below are considered part of the Terms and Conditions for the use of Casiocalculators-MEA.com and its provisions.
Please read the following carefully to understand how we will treat your personal information provided via registration.
Through registering to Casiocalculators-MEA.com, we will collect your following personal information (“Personal Information”):

ul.li: Your name, age, gender, nationality, telephone number, email address, and other information; and
Your preference and impression on any products and services.

div.p: We will use your Personal Information for the following purposes (“Purposes”) to:

ul.li: Provide you with invitations to events, newsletters, promotional information, updates, and any other information relating to our products and services;
Develop, enhance, and/or improve our products and services;
Respond to your inquiries, or contact you for security and fraud prevention purposes.

div.p: We may use cookies and other technologies (collectively “Cookies”) on our website to collect information that helps us enhance your experience and our products, services, and website.

Cookies are small text files of letters and numbers that our website places on your computer or other equipment which you use to access our website. These Cookies allow us to distinguish you from other users of our website. You can read more about cookies and how to recognize them at www.aboutcookies.org.

p.strong: Management and Security of Personal Information

div.p: We, as reasonably practicable, ensure the integrity and confidentiality of the Personal Information in our possession or under our control, and endeavour to manage the Personal Information in an appropriate manner in order to protect any personally identifiable information included in the Personal Information. Additionally, we ensure that we take any reasonably practical steps to ensure that the Personal Information is complete, accurate, not misleading, and updated where necessary.

The Personal Information is transmitted to and stored in a server operated by a third party, which server may be located outside of your country. We endeavour to ensure that the third party, who is the recipient of the Personal Information, is subject to a law or binding agreement that provides an adequate level of protection that effectively upholds substantially similar conditions for the lawful processing of the Personal Information, and/or provides for sufficient security safeguards relating to the further transfer of the Personal Information to third parties who are in a foreign country.

p.strong: Providing and Disclosing Personal Information to Third Parties

div.p: The Personal Information may be provided and disclosed to our parent company, subsidiaries, distributors, service partners, and subcontractors for accomplishing the Purposes described above. Additionally, we may provide and disclose the Personal Information to any judicial or governmental authorities if so required by them, in accordance with any applicable laws, rules, or regulations.

We reserve the right to make any changes to this Privacy Notice. If specifically required to do so by the applicable laws, we will seek your prior consent before applying such changes to your Personal Information.

The Personal Information will be retained only for as long as necessary for the accomplishment of the Purposes described above, or as authorised by law. Removal of personal information is associated with Unsubscribing from our website or emailing us with your wish to remove your personal information at education@casio.ae. Additionally, upon expiration of the authorised period of retention, we ensure the destruction or deletion of the record of the Personal Information or de-identify such information in a manner that prevents its reconstruction in any intelligible form.

Children under the age of 13 are not permitted to create an account or register to Casiocalculators-MEA.com. Children between the ages of 14 and 17 years are not permitted to register on the forum without the consent of the child’s parent or legal guardian.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Notice, please contact us at education@casio.ae.
